tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NP (NP (NN Love)) (NP (PRP it))) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (NNS people)) (VP (VB step))))) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (PRP$ my) (NN dog) (POS 's)) (NN shit)))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Love/NN dep>it/PRP acl:relcl>[step/VB advmod>when/WRB nsubj>people/NNS] nmod:in>[shit/NN case>in/IN nmod:poss>[dog/NN nmod:poss>my/PRP$ case>'s/POS]]]
